title: Help me Lag Problems? Asap
body: Every day I'm playing league and and lately I just get so much weird lag my ping is solid 50 and my fps is around 70 but for some reason nearly every game during landing phase the minions health bars disappear they tumble around and jump all over each other making it impossible to CS and I have to tab out of the game and manually reconnect to fix it and TS happening litterally 5 + times every game and it's making me loose pretty much every time I play I can't even enjoy having fun playing because of this, I've tried factory resetting my computer reinstalling league resetting my router everything! Nothing has worked it just keeps happening and I'm starting to keep bans from leaving games because it's just so frustrating it just seems to be early games mid to late game it stops I don't think it's my internet as my ping and fps are fine and I don't have lag playing ANYTHING else please tell me if you have had this and how to fix it because Its ruining everything for me Please help!

replies.body:
Hey,

From your description it sounds like pretty bad packet loss.  There are a few things you can do to check it out.

* Examine your game logs using something like [Logs of Lag](http://logsoflag.com) to see what conditions the league client is seeing.
* Run a traceroute to 103.240.227.1 and see what path packets take from you to the league servers.
* Try out out the suggestions on the [troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support page. If you're using Wifi, definitely try using a cable to connect to your router.

Cheers
Mindstar
